thread.title: Thieves break into church and throw safe from balcony to break it open
thread.title_full: Thieves break into church and throw safe from balcony to break it open | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Thieves break into church and throw safe from balcony to break it open
text:
A church in Coseley in Dudley has been targeted by thieves. Christ Church was broken into on Sunday night with vandals throwing the safe from the balcony to break it open.
On a post shared by the church on social media Reverend Emma Stanford said she was "heartbroken" that people had done this to her "beloved church".
Thieves threw the safe from the balcony to break it open Credit: Christ Church Coseley "I'm heart broken. Came over to my beloved church this morning to find that it has been broken into. Simply awful thing to do to Christ Church and the people of Coseley. At the moment it feels like all the glorious memories of this church and the people who it belongs to have been violated. How could anyone do such a thing. Disgusting."
â€“ Reverend Emma Stanford Sorry, this content isn't available on your device.
Members of the community have rallied around in support of the church and the Reverend has said that they "forgive" the vandals.
Sorry, this content isn't available on your device.
 Coseley West Midlands
